why.title: Direct Sourcing
why.desc: We source products directly from the very people who produce them, guaranteeing freshness and authenticity.

why.title: Global Reach
why.desc: Our products have reached international markets, bringing a taste of Indonesia to households worldwide.

why.title: Ethical Practies
why.desc: We adhere to ethical business practices, complying with all relevant regulations and certifications.

why.title: Community Focus
why.desc: Our business is driven by a deep commitment to improving the quality of life for local communities.

vision: Moving forward with Farmers, Fishermen and MSMEs
mission: Opening the way for farmers, fishermen and MSMEs to sell their products to foreign countries
Make it easy for World Citizens to enjoy native commodities from our area
Providing information, education and assistance to farmers, fishermen and MSMEs
Improving the quality of life together
Stimulating innovative and creative farmers, fishermen and MSMEs
Provide a positive effect on the economy of local and global communities

core_values.title: Empowerment
core_values.desc: We empower local producers by providing them access to international markets, helping them expand their reach and improve their livelihoods.

core_values.title: Quality
core_values.desc: We are committed to delivering the highest quality products, ensuring that each item reflects the rich flavors and craftsmanship of Indonesia.

core_values.title: Sustainability
core_values.desc: We believe in sustainable practices that protect our natural resources and maintain the cultural heritage of our region.

core_values.title: Innovation
core_values.desc: We foster innovation among local farmers, fishermen, and artisans, enabling them to compete in the global marketplace.

items.name: Exceptional Quality
items.description: Our products are known for their exceptional quality, freshness, and unique flavors. We take great care in selecting and sourcing the best commodities from our region.

items.name: Supporting Local Products
items.description: Our business model is centered around empowering local producers. When you choose our products, you're not only getting exceptional goods but also contributing to the growth and prosperity of small-scale farmers and artisans.

items.name: Direct Sourcing
items.description: We pride ourselves on our direct sourcing approach. By eliminating intermediaries, we ensure that our products maintain their authenticity and reach consumers in the best possible condition.

items.name: Cultural Richness
items.description: We pride ourselves on our direct sourcing approach. By eliminating intermediaries, we ensure that our products maintain their authenticity and reach consumers in the best possible condition.

items.name: Sustainability
items.description: We are committed to sustainable practices that not only protect our environment but also support the long-term livelihoods of local communities. Our products are the result of responsible and eco-friendly production methods.

products.name: Dry Cashews
products.description: Seaweed is a macro algae plant, which does not have true roots, stems, and leaves. Generally live on the bottom of shallow sandy waters or beds. Divided into four parts, namely green-blue (Cyanophyta), red (Rhodophyta), brown (phaeophyta). Contains Vitamins and Minerals, Vitamins; A, C, B6, B12 and substances; iron, magnesium, niacin, thiamine, manganese, magnesium, calcium. It is an additional food that is healthy and good for regular consumption.

products.name: Peeled Coconut
products.description: Coconut is the main commodity in the province of Southeast Sulawesi, Indonesia.  This commodity is very promising for buyers because of its adequate quality and quantity.  and the quality of the coconut itself is very good and high quality.  Southeast Sulawesi province has various types of coconut whose flesh tastes very delicious and sweet.  Southeast Sulawesi Province is very famous for its many coconut trees.  There is one area, namely Wawonii Regency, which is nicknamed Coconut Island.  We will maintain the quality of the coconut fruit until it reaches the buyer.
